Description: B.C. Rich Revenge Electric Guitar WhiteThe B.C. Rich Revenge Warlock has a solid agathis body, sports a bolt-on hard maple neck, trademark widow headstock, chrome hardware and two high output BDSM humbucker pickups guaranteed to rock. This flattop version of the Warlock comes in black with white binding as well as white with black binding, and the rosewood fingerboard has killer diamond inlays. Chrome hardware and a tune-o-matic bridge.
